name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Ice Cream + Waffles - a true soul mate pairing The way our golden Belgian waffles are made and freshly baked - the golden crispy crust and soft fluffy honeycomb texture inside - it's the perfect combination with our creamy ice creams. All made fresh in-house from scratch with real quality ingredients. No preservatives, no nasties.#SoGoodSoFresh #Creamier #IceCream #Waffles #ProudlyMadeInSingapore #Singapore #MadeWithPassion

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: When was the last time you savored a triple scoop on our freshly baked golden waffles? Or shared a moment of joy over delicious freshly churned double scoops? Make your way to Creamier for your dose of happiness. Creamier East CoastCreamier Gillman BarracksCreamier Margaret MarketCreamier Punggol NorthshoreCreamier Tiong BahruCreamier Toa PayohClick here to find us - https://creamier.com.sg/locations/#SoGoodSoFresh #FreshlyChurned #IceCream #Waffle #Coffee #Creamier #Happiness #Singapore #sgcafes

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Creamier’s guide to celebrating birthdays! If you’re in-store at Margaret Drive, check out our newly launched Creamier OMG - add a candle for birthday vibes.Staying nearby our outlets? Hit up our food delivery platforms for a fuss-free delivery of our Scoops of Happiness.And if you’re planning for a party ahead, order our ice cream pints and frozen waffles for a full dessert experience at home.#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #waffles #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Calling all the goodest boys and girls to Creamier Gillman Barracks. @charliesugliesThe weekend is fast approaching and our Pup Day Out continues!Our Creamier Gillman Barracks outdoor area is pet-friendly. Come visit us with your doggo, order a set of waffles and your pup enjoys a Pup Cup on us!Limited time offer only. While stocks last. Terms & conditions apply. #creamier #handcrafted #icecream #singapore #local #artisanal #dessert #cafe #pup #dog #dogicecream #momentsofhappiness

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: If you’re in the Marina/Suntec area and crave a taste of Creamier, here’s your chance! Creamier is part of the AMEX Shop Small Popup Market from 25 Sep till 1 Oct. We’ll be serving ice cream with a waffle topping, and take home pints as well!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #singapore#momentsofhappiness #artisanal #local #dessert #cafe

content: Don’t miss out on Pup Day Out today at Creamier Gillman Barracks  bring your fur kid along and enjoy happy bonding time. Our outdoor seating area is dog-friendly. The pups can enjoy a free pup cup for every dine-in waffle order  #weekend #happiness #icecream #icecreamfordogs #creamier

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Tuesdays just got better. Pop into Creamier East Coast and enjoy Double Scoop Tuesdays with us!Order a double scoop and receive the second double scoop free. Available at Creamier East Coast from 2-10pm on Tuesdays.Limited time offer only on 26th Sep, 3rd Oct, 10th Oct, 17th Oct, 24th Oct, 31st Oct#creamier #creamier_sg #momentsofhappiness #icecream #doublescoop #tuesdays

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Just right for me night, date night, family night, cheat night. Scooping till 10pm across all stores. #icecream #momentsofhappiness

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: When the heat gets to you, cool off with our Fresh Mint Melon Experience a refreshing blend of fresh mint and crisp sapo melon, creating a sweet and juicy flavour that is invigorating for the soul.Stay tuned for our second special this month!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #singapore#momentsofhappiness #artisanal #local #dessert #cafe

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: The richness in life lies in our memories of the moments. A place to create happy memories, and so this has become our ethos in designing Creamier spaces, where anyone is welcomed and happy moments are created over scoops of delicious ice cream or a cup of coffee. Moments of Happiness Art ExhibitionCreamier x Organisation of Illustrators Council SingaporeFor first-time visitors to our Toa Payoh and Punggol Northshore spaces, these @oicsingapore prints are available for purchase! Just drop us a form enquiry via the #linkinbio#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local #art

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: #YongSiakStreetKidsTrail kicks off today and we have two specials at Creamier Tiong Bahru only.Enjoy the taste of tradition and innovation with @microbakerykitchen and Creamier’s Rainbow Ice Cream Bread! Naturally coloured with matcha and sweet potato powder, the rainbow bread is paired with our heritage flavours for the month - Waffled Putu Piring, Sesame Tang Yuan and Pulut Hitam.If you’d like to recreate this after this weekend, take home our bread and ice cream bundle! Starting from $21.90, choose your favourite Creamier ice cream pint to go along with this freshly crafted @microbakerykitchen rainbow bread loaf.We’re looking forward to seeing all the #YongSiakKids and #kidsatheart today!P.S. If you’re taking part in the Magical Trail, we have a Tikam game that is free for all participants to take part! Just swing by Creamier’s little booth, answer some questions about Singapore’s history and keep trying till you secure a well-deserved treat!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #cafe #momentsofhappiness #artisanal #dessert #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Meet our Rainbow Ice Cream Bread, a co-creation between @microbakerykitchen and Creamier, as our special for the Yong Siak Street Children's Trail happening this Sunday (20th August) along Yong Siak Street.The bread is freshly crafted by Micro Bakery, and is naturally coloured with Matcha and Sweet Potato Powder for that iconic local rainbow bread look. In line with National Day this August, we paired it with our three heritage flavours - Waffled Putu Piring, Sesame Tang Yu… See more

content: When this weather calls for more than a single scoop! Happy weekend everyone! #creamier #handcrafted #icecream #creamier_sg #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Creamier weekends. Take it slow and enjoy good desserts. Best pairing - Roasted Pistachio and Plain Ole Chocolate with freshly baked Belgian waffles. Available at all stores - Toa Payoh, East Coast, Punggol Northshore, Gillman Barracks and Tiong Bahru #weekends #happiness

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: We’re ramping up for @singaporefoodfestival! Spot something you’ll like? Our SFF exclusive menu includes Sesame Tang Yuan, Choco Peanut Butter Pretzel (an @oatside flavour) and Waffled Putu Piring, featuring @bege.rack’s Chong Pang Putu Piring. Tickets now on sale at the #linkinbio. See you there?

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: The Sweets Alley at the Festival Village will showcase a delightful assortment of mouth-watering sweets and heavenly desserts to satisfy your sweet tooth. From classic treats to unique delights, it's an indulgent celebration of all things delicious. #SingaporeFoodFestival #SFF2023 #RealFoodiesOnly #PassionMadePossible #VisitSingapore #sgig #foodpornsg #sgfood #sgeats #burpple #hungrygowhere #exploresingapore #instafood #eeeeats #singaporeinsiders #sgfoodies #sgfoodporn #igfood #foodgasm #gourmandisesg #sgfoodie

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Throwback to Summer Soda Floats and CatBee’s Green Cookie Dough Monster. Auction for @iamcatbee x @shiaaaan Plushies and @iamcatbee x @amigurumei Crochet Dolls are ending soon! Check out #linkinbio to bid on them..Reposted from @little_kosaji.sg【シンガポール食のマーケッターの⇄食で2カ国を繋げる】 @creamier_sg is supporting @iamcatbee ‘s art exhibition at its Tiong Bahru outlet. You could buy the selected items from @iamcatbee there. Also there is a special ice creme that is made for the artist Aisha！.Cat beeのアーティストAishaは自閉症者のスクールに通う学生であり、アーティストでもある。彼女の作品は、モンスターシリーズが特徴的。明るく、ほっこりさせてくれる雰囲気がある。現在、アイスクリーム店、@creamier_sg のTiong Bahruで作品の展示、グッズの販売が行われている。.期間限定で、green cookie dough monsterのアイスクリームパインとも販売中！上品な抹茶と、クランベリークッキーdoughの組み合わせが(p3, p8).また @creamier_sg では現在、日本風のクリームソーダも期間限定で販売中。(p1)（これが美味しいの、なんのアイスクリームがミルキーで、過去1番美味しいクリームソーダS$8/学生証提示で、学生は6/30までS$6.5）. @creamier_sg Creamier Handcrafted Ice creme(78 Yong Siak Street #01-18)他、支店2件あり@iamcatbee とのコラボは上記店舗のみTiong BahruOpening Hours: ୨୧┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈୨୧こさじのつぶやき今回イベント参加で、開いたかったこちらの @creamier_sg のオーナーさんにも会えました。想像以上に素敵な方々。ブランドがここまで広がるのも納得なオーナーの人柄に感動アーティストAishaのご家族も、勢揃いですが、すごくアートを愛する家族で、家族一丸となって @iamcatbee を支えています。結局は人に行き着く、料理もアートも。୨୧┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈୨୧.■こさじ @little_kosaji.sg の仕事にて唯一無二の食イベント、マーケティング会社経営食の市場調査・リサーチ案件多数手掛けております。Alchemist Pte Ltdで検索お願いします！.■公式LINE @little_kosaji.sg では、平凡過ぎる私「こさじ」が、海外への憧れを、憧れだけに終わらせず、大学時代に、交換留学生に選ばれ（ここは大きな転機だった！）アメリカ留学→日本勤務（秘境旅行会社）を経て→イギリス勤務（実は応募者500人強の中から合格！）で出会った人と国際結婚し、シンガポールでグローバルに生活&ビジネスしている・・こう書くと、凄いギラってますが、私は本当に平凡な人間です・・でも行動を繰り返し今に！まるで漫画のような様々な体験&失敗をもれなく配信。笑いネタ・自虐ネタに自信あり。しかし、起業家なので、たまには良いこと呟きます平凡人間でも海外生活、起業、夢の叶え方が気になる方は、行動が聞けるヒントが「無料」で受け取れますよ！そんな、気になるLINE登録は @little_kosaji.sg のプロフリンクから#シンガポールグルメ #シンガポール観光#シンガポールランチ #シンガポール在住 #シンガポール生活#sgfoodblog #sg #sgfoodporn #女性起業 #海外移住#sgfoodtrend # #catbee #icecreme #creamier #新加坡美食 #싱가포르

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: We’re all smiles for our monthly specials this July!Launching today in all Creamier cafés - grab the first taste of Toffee Buttered Pecans and Mocha Caramel Rocks. Our well-loved Honey Lemon Yuzu Sorbet has also made a comeback.Let us know in the comments - which flavour you’re most excited to try!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Good coffee to start the weekend right #weekend #happiness

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: East-siders rejoice - we have a little surprise for you!Starting today while stocks last, order a Summer Ice Cream Float, flash your Happiness Card and enjoy a nostalgic Japanese sweet treat on us!Mochimochi-kun takes us back to our childhood days where we enjoyed little sweets from the Mama Shop. We spotted these on the streets of Japan and couldn’t resist bringing them back to Singapore with us. Grab them before they’re gone!… See more

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Enjoy variety for your small office gathering or home party!Our Scoops of Happiness are sold as a set of 3 cups per flavour.Order through our online store at the #linkinbio, 3 days lead-time required!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: With monthly specials being rolled out, you never know which flavours we will return to the vault. Head on down to try the June specials - Mango Coco (vegan), Earl Grey Lychee and Mashumaro Grape Jelly Yoghurt!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: With temperatures in Singapore expected to feel like 38-45°C over the few days, you know where you’ll find us. Sipping on some retro Japanese ice cream sodas, wishing we were in really Japan this June holidays #creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: You’ve seen @iamcatbee’s Anything Monsters takeover our café as an art exhibition and retail collection. A new whimsical monster has now invaded our Creamier Tiong Bahru ice cream display as well!Meet the Green Cookie Dough Monster - where earthy matcha and tart cranberry cookie dough come together as a celebration of Aisha's two favourites.The artist behind CatBee has an immense love for baking and all things green, serving as inspiration for an exclusive ice cream at Creamier Tiong Bahru, created in conjunction with the Anything Monsters collection.#creamier #momentsofhappiness #icecream #local #singapore #handcrafted

name: Creamier Handcrafted Ice Cream and Coffee
content: Have you grabbed your Creamier Happiness Stamp Card yet? Earn rewards with each purchase and unlock special promotions released exclusively for cardholders through our newsletter. Stay updated by signing up through the #linkinbio!#creamier #handcrafted #icecream #momentsofhappiness #singapore #local
